title: The Hounds of Tindalos
description: This 1963 Belmont Books paperback edition contains nine stories from the original Arkham House hardcover edition of 1946.Dark Vision (1939) story Golden Child (1945) novelette The Black Druid (1930) story The Space-Eaters (1928) novelette Grab Bags Are Dangerous (1942) story Fisherman's Luck (1940) story The Elemental (1939) story The Peeper (1944) story The Hounds of Tindalos (1929) story
author: Frank Belknap Long
